title: GOP Lawmaker Claims Taliban Currently Holding Americans 'Hostage for Demands'
content:
1. GOP Lawmaker Claims Taliban Currently Holding Americans 'Hostage for Demands'  The Daily Beast
  2. GOP Rep. McCaul says 6 planes with Americans onboard are stuck at Afghanistan airport in 'hostage situation' with Taliban  Yahoo News
  3. McCaul says situation in Afghanistan is 'worse' than pre-9/11 because Taliban has US weapons | TheHill  The Hill
  4. Afghanistan: What's life like since the Taliban took over?  BBC News
  5. The Latest: Top Republican Says Taliban Holding Americans  U.S. News & World Report
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 共和党議員、タリバンは現在アメリカ人を「要求の人質」にしていると主張
美国国会议员声称塔利班目前将美国人作为 "人质要求"。
美國國會議員聲稱塔利班目前將美國人作爲 "人質要求"。
